quotes.content: A book is a gift you can open again and again.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.content: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.content: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.content: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.content: A word after a word after a word is power.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.content: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.content: Books are mirrors: You only see in them what you already have inside you.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz

quotes.content: If you don't like to read, you haven't found the right book.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.content: I can feel infinitely alive curled up on the sofa reading a book.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.content: Some books leave us free and some books make us free.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: We tell ourselves stories in order to live.
quotes.author: Joan Didion
